name: Zed Killah
description:
Get ready to take on the zombie horde in this 3D top-down shooter game. As a prototype, this game is all about action and non-stop zombie killing.

In this game, you'll use your weapons to take out as many zombies as you can, racking up points with each successful kill. 

The game is simple: survive as long as you can and aim for the highest score possible. 

So, grab your weapons and get ready to take on the zombie horde. How long will you last? How high can you score? PLAY NOW to find out!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
W,A,S,D - move
mouse - aim
left mouse click - shoot/attack
shift - run
!YOU CAN'T SHOOT/ATTACK WHILST RUNNING!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.  Download the game files.

2. Extract the .zip file

3. Run the Zed Killah.exe file.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits for the weapons icons go to:
https://thenounproject.com/bacontaco/

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: This is just a simple prototype of a game.
